name: Bobotie (The Boschendal's recipe)
recipeIngredient: 1 slice day-old white or brown bread

recipeInstructions.text: Brown the onions and garlic lightly in the oil and add the curry powder. Cook gently for about two minutes. Meantime, soak the bread in the milk and squeeze dry, saving the milk. In a large mixing bowl, add the onion mixture to the bread plus all the remaining ingredients except one egg. Mix well.
Pack into an ovenproof dish that has been rubbed with butter. Bake at 350 degrees Fahrenheit for one hour.
Beat the remaining egg with a little of the saved milk and pour over the top.
Bake a further 15 to 20 minutes until the custard is set and the top a golden brown. Serve with rice and stewed apricots.
